module.title: cùl
module.p: cùl is a common noun with the general meaning back, rear, (area) behind.

ul.li: càin [verb] abuse verbally ⇒ cùl-chàin [verb] slander, defame
sleamhainn [adjective] slippery ⇒ sleamhnaich [verb] slide, slip ⇒ cùl-shleamhnaich [verb] backslide, relapse into bad ways or error
spreadh [verb] burst, explode ⇒ cùl-spreadh [verb] backfire (of an engine, gun)
cuideachd [feminine noun] body or men/soldiers ⇒ cùl-chuideachd [feminine noun] rearguard, reserve
earail [feminine noun] caution ⇒ earalas [masculine noun] caution, cautiousness ⇒ cùl-earalas [masculine noun] reserve
mùtaire [masculine noun] smuggler ⇒ cùl-mhùtaire [masculine noun] smuggler
cùl-cinn, cùl a’ bhaile common grazing
